title: Trying to ID a serif similar to Garamon/Caslon
content:
Hey guys,

Found this font in edition 82 of Eye Magazine and can't figure out what it is. Has a pretty unique italic. Any help would be much appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012122135im_/http:/typophile.com/files/regular1_3678.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012122135im_/http:/typophile.com/files/italic2_5473.jpg)
author: Emmmm
